titleStmt.title: The Queenes visiting of the campe at Tilsburie with her entertainment there to the tune of Wilsons wilde
titleStmt.author: Deloney, Thomas, 1543?-1600.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn VVolfe for Edward White,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: T.D. = the author, Thomas Deloney.
Verse - "W .. in the yeare of Christ our Lord".
A different text from the similarly titled STC 14067--STC.
Imperfect; opening words of text faded and difficult to read.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
